check_items.description: Verify that the voting agent has been initialized correctly.
Check that the voting agent has access to the list of eligible voters.
Ensure the voting agent can receive and process votes correctly.
Confirm that the voting agent can accurately tally votes.
Verify the voting agent can determine the winning outcome based on the votes.
Ensure the voting agent can handle edge cases, such as ties or invalid votes.
Check that the voting agent can communicate the voting results effectively.
Confirm that the voting agent maintains a secure and auditable record of all votes.
Verify that the voting agent adheres to the specified voting rules and procedures.
Ensure the voting agent can be reset or reconfigured for new votes, if necessary.
